remarks.para: Use this class's property to read the configuration settings from your code.

Place a copy of the WebConfiguration.xsd schema file into Visual Studio's xml schema directory (C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003\Common7\Packages\schemas\xml) to provide IntelliSense for the web.config.

Class.example:
Register the configuration section in the configuration file within the configSections element and create the configuration section for rubicon.web. The configSections element must precede all configuration sections.
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <configuration>
<configSections> <section name="rubicon.web" type="Rubicon.Web.Configuration.WebConfiguration, Rubicon.Web" /> <!-- Other configuration section registrations. --> </configSections>
<rubicon.web xmlns="http://www.rubicon-it.com/commons/web/configuration"> <!-- The configuration section entries. --> <executionEngine defaultWxeHandler="~/WxeHandler.ashx" enableSessionManagement="true" functionTimeout="20" refreshInterval="10" urlMappingFile="C:\ProjectDirectory\UrlMapping.xml" /> <resources root="res" /> <smartNavigation enableScrolling="true" enableFocusing="true" /> <wcag conformanceLevel="Undefined" debugging="Disabled" /> </rubicon.web>
<!-- Other configuration sections. --> </configuration>
